entry.title: $2600 // Just Reduced! One of a Kind Loft-like Triplex with Elevator; Private O
entry.content:
Just Reduced! One of a Kind Loft-like Triplex with Elevator; Private Outdoor Space!

Listing ID #: 1536831
Price: $2,600
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: Cats Only

Building Amenities

Elevator
Laundry

Apartment Amenities

Balcony
Duplex
Fireplace
Garden
Hardwood
Light
Loft
Multi Level
Patio
Private Deck
Triplex
Park View

This is an over-sized triplex situated in the prime 80s on the Upper East Side. The apartment is truly one of a kind. You will find nothing like this on the Upper East Side! The apartment is on a beautiful, quiet, tree-lined block. It boasts two separate entrances as it is multi-level with gorgeous hardwood floors throughout and a ton of natural light that floods the entire space. The second floor features a fireplace with exposed brick walls and spacious living area and so graciously opens out into your own private outdoor space. As you could imagine, there is ample storage space. There is also a decorative fireplace. This quiet building also generously has an elevator that opens up right onto the apartment. This truly is all the space you could dream of for the price and a rare find for the market's inventory. Contact for an immediate showing as it is available to be shown anytime.
 

Sandra Dor
